SpellCard.name: Polymorph
SpellCard.description: Transform minion in to a 1/1 sheep.

SpellCard.name: RollingFireball
SpellCard.description: Deal 8 damage to a minion. Any excess damage continues to the left or right.1 sheep.

MinionCard.name: Abusive Sergeant
MinionCard.description: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.

MinionCard.name: Hungry Crab
MinionCard.description: Destroy a Murloc and gain +2/+2.

MinionCard.name: Goblin Bomb
MinionCard.description: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.

MinionCard.name: Beaming Sidekick
MinionCard.description: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.

MinionCard.name: Lost Spirit
MinionCard.description: Deathrattle: Give your minions +1 Attack.

MinionCard.name: Abusive Sergeant
MinionCard.description: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.

SpellCard.name: Backstab
SpellCard.description: Deal 2 damage to an undamaged minion.

SpellCard.name: Malygos's Frostbolt
SpellCard.description: Deal 3 damage to a character and Freeze it.

SpellCard.name: Malygos's Nova
SpellCard.description: Freeze all enemy minions.

SpellCard.name: Malygos's Explosion
SpellCard.description: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.

SpellCard.name: Time Rip
SpellCard.description: Destroy a minion. Invoke Galakrond.

SpellCard.name: Candle Breath
SpellCard.description: Draw 3 cards. Costs (3) less while you're holding a Dragon.

SpellCard.name: Friendly Smith
SpellCard.description: Discover a weapon from any class. Add it to your Adventure Deck with +2/+2

SpellCard.name: Blink Fox
SpellCard.description: Battlecry: Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
